00034 class SWModule;

00046 class CSwordModuleInfo : public CModuleInfo  {
00047 public:
00048     enum type { Bible, Commentary, Lexicon, Unknown };
00053   enum unlockErrorCode {
00054         noError,    /* No error occured, everything worked ok. The key was written to the config*/
00055         wrongUnlockKey, /* The wrong key was used. Module is not unlocked */                
00056         notLocked, /* The module was not locked so it can't be unlocked */
00057         noPermission /* The key was not written to config because we have no permissions*/
00058     };  
00062     CSwordModuleInfo( CSwordBackend* backend, SWModule* module );
00066     virtual ~CSwordModuleInfo();    
00070   CSwordBackend* backend() const;
00074   SWModule* module() const;
00079   const CSwordModuleInfo::unlockErrorCode unlock( const QString unlockKey );
00087   CHTMLEntryDisplay* getDisplay() const;
00092   const QString getCipherKey() const;
00098   const bool isEncrypted() const;
00103   const bool isLocked();
00107   const QString getPath() const;
00112   const QString getVersion() const;
00117   const QString getAboutInformation() const;
00121   const QString getDescription() const;
00127   virtual const bool search( const QString searchedText, const int searchOptions, ListKey scope, void (*percent)(char, void*));
00132   virtual const ListKey& getSearchResult();
00136   virtual void interruptSearch();
00142   void clearSearchResult();
00148   virtual const bool supportsFeature( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions type );
00152   void setFont(const QFont &font);
00156   const QFont getFont();
00160   const bool hasFont();
00164   virtual const CSwordModuleInfo::type getType() const;
00165 
00166 private:
00167     SWModule*   m_module;
00168     ListKey m_searchResult;
00169     CSwordBackend* m_backend;
00170 };
00171 
00172 //class CSwordModuleInfo;

00176 inline const CSwordModuleInfo::type CSwordModuleInfo::getType() const {
00177     return CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown;
00178 }
00179 
00181 inline SWModule* CSwordModuleInfo::module() const {
